items.title: Centre raises objection to Vedanta's demerger over 'concealment', Sebi warning for modifying Scheme of Arrangement
items.description: Vedanta had on August 14 received an administrative warning from Sebi over modification to the Scheme of Arrangement without prior written consent of Sebi.

items.title: Online Gaming Bill: Proposed clampdown may put 2 lakh jobs at risk, lead to loss of Rs 20,000cr in tax revenue
items.description: The online gaming sector contributes significantly to government finances, with a potential loss of Rs 20,000 crore in tax revenues
